Name: RampartCompany
Details: Company Rampart is a flexible, agile fighting force designed to carry out shadow operations in coordination with supporting mercenary command. Formed during 'Operation Restored Hope' under the command of Karen 'Sunbird' Andris. The company is comprised from a select group of 'Headhunted' Mercenary Units, reportedly a dozen or more. Company's habitual use of deception and false flag operations, it is difficult to say with certainty how many engagements they have participated in since their inception.
